00014 template<class KeyT, class DataT, class PredT = std::less<KeyT>, class AllocT = scoped_alloc>
00015 class Map : public std::map< KeyT, DataT, PredT, stl_allocator<DataT, AllocT> >
00016 {
00017 private:
00018         typedef stl_allocator<DataT, AllocT> StlAllocT;
00019         typedef std::map<KeyT, DataT, PredT, StlAllocT> Base;
00020 
00021 public:
00022         explicit Map(AllocT& alloc, const PredT& pred = PredT())
00023                 : Base(pred, alloc)
00024         {
00025         }
00026 
00027         template <class Iterator>
00028         Map(AllocT& alloc, Iterator first, Iterator last, const PredT& pred = PredT())
00029                 : Base(first, last, pred, alloc)
00030         {
00031         }
00032 
00033         void copy(const Base& from) {
00034                 Base::operator=(from);
00035         }
00036 };
